home.aboutText: We specialize in the curation and exhibition of iconic mid-century modern furniture. Each piece in our collection is carefully selected, carrying the most brilliant creativity and craftsmanship in design history. From the American elegance of Eames to the minimalism of Jeanneret, we are dedicated to bringing these timeless designs to those who appreciate the art of living.

descriptions.eames: Charles and Ray Eames are among the most influential designers of the twentieth century. Their work seamlessly blends art, architecture, and industrial design, creating timeless pieces that are both beautiful and functional.
descriptions.pierre-jeanneret: Pierre Jeanneret's furniture series designed for the Chandigarh urban planning project in India is renowned worldwide for its distinctive minimalist aesthetic and handcrafted teak wood craftsmanship.
descriptions.le-corbusier: Le Corbusier, regarded as the father of modern architecture, brought the same functionalist and geometric aesthetic principles to his furniture design.
descriptions.charlotte-perriand: Charlotte Perriand was a pioneer of French modernist design, skillfully blending Japanese aesthetics with European modernism in her work.
descriptions.jean-prouve: Jean Prouve was a French master of industrial design, celebrated for his innovative metal structures and engineering aesthetics. His works remain highly prized by collectors.
descriptions.pierre-chapo: Pierre Chapo's wooden furniture is renowned for its exquisite joinery craftsmanship and organic forms, with each piece serving as a tribute to natural materials.
descriptions.poul-henningsen: Poul Henningsen was a Danish lighting design master. His PH series lamps achieve glare-free illumination through their distinctive multi-layered shade design.
descriptions.bernard-albin-gras: Bernard-Albin Gras's industrial lamp series has become a benchmark in design history, distinguished by its classic articulated structure and minimalist form.

about.title: About Us
about.heroSubtitle: Preserving classic design, connecting past and future
about.storyText1: Founded on a deep passion for mid-century design, our gallery is dedicated to discovering, collecting, and showcasing the most iconic pieces of modern furniture. Every item is carefully curated and professionally restored to ensure it is presented in its finest condition.
about.storyText2: From Los Angeles to Chandigarh, from Copenhagen to Paris, we search the globe for precious works that carry the memory of design history. We believe that great design transcends time, and that classic pieces continue to radiate their unique charm in contemporary spaces.
about.philosophyText: We focus on design works that balance function and aesthetics. Each piece tells a story of innovation, craftsmanship, and the spirit of its era. We are not merely selling furniture â€” we are sharing an understanding of design and an approach to living.
